subdisciplines.name: Ancient Greek Drama
subdisciplines.description: The study of the plays and theatrical productions from ancient Greece.

subdisciplines.name: Homer
subdisciplines.description: The study of the epic poems 'The Iliad' and 'The Odyssey' and their impact on Greek Literature.

subdisciplines.name: Greek Poetry
subdisciplines.description: The study of poetry from ancient Greece and its literary significance.
